subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Brian Cashman, the Yankees' general manager, pulled off the only move he said he could make, claiming an outfielder from the Kansas City Royals and calling up a former Royals pitcher from Class AAA Columbus.
snippet: Brian Cashman, the Yankees' general manager, pulled off the only move he said he could make, claiming an outfielder from the Kansas City Royals and calling up a former Royals pitcher from Class AAA Columbus.
